member.name: T:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs
member.summary: The base class for all gesture event args.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: This flag could be set to false to run other eventhandlers of the same or surrounding elements. It is not used on every platform! Default value is true.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.Sender
member.summary: The element which raised this event.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.Cancelled
member.summary: Android and iOS sometimes cancel a touch gesture. In this case we raise a *ed event with Cancelled set to true.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.ViewPosition
member.summary: The position of the on the screen.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.NumberOfTouches
member.summary: The number of fingers on the screen. This is currently 1 for , , and . and set this value to 2.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.BaseGestureEventArgs.Touches
member.summary: Returns the position of the fingers on the screen.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.LongPressEventArgs
member.summary: The arguments for the LongPressing and LongPressed events.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.TapEventArgs
member.summary: The arguments for the Tapping, Tapped and DoubleTapped events.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.TapEventArgs.NumberOfTaps
member.summary: The number of taps in a short period of time (~250ms).

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.LongPressEventArgs.Duration
member.summary: Duration of long press in milliseconds.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.PanEventArgs
member.summary: The arguments for the Panning and Panned events.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PanEventArgs.DeltaDistance
member.summary: The distance in X/Y that the finger was moved since this event was raised the last time.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PanEventArgs.TotalDistance
member.summary: The distance in X/Y that the finger was moved since the pan gesture began.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PanEventArgs.Velocity
member.summary: The velocity of the finger in X/Y.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.PinchEventArgs
member.summary: The arguments for the Pinching and Pinched events.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PinchEventArgs.Distance
member.summary: The distance between the first two fingers.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PinchEventArgs.DeltaScale
member.summary: The relative distance between the two fingers on the screen compared to the last time this event was raised.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PinchEventArgs.TotalScale
member.summary: The relative distance between the two fingers on the screen compared to when the gesture started.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.PinchEventArgs.Center
member.summary: The center of the fingers on the screen.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.RotateEventArgs
member.summary: The arguments for the Rotating and Rotated events.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.RotateEventArgs.Angle
member.summary: The angle a line from the first to the second finger currently has on the screen.
